item.title: A new, open source text-to-speech model called Dia has arrived to challenge ElevenLabs, OpenAI and more
item.description: With a focus on expressive quality, reproducibility, and open access, Dia adds a distinctive new voice to the landscape of text-to-speech.

item.title: eSelf will bring private AI tutors to students worldwide
item.description: eSelf, a startup that focuses on conversational AI agents, is partnering an educational group to bring private AI tutors to students.

item.title: Watch: Google DeepMind CEO and AI Nobel winner Demis Hassabis on CBS’ ’60 Minutes’
item.description: The segment ended with a meditation on the future: a world where AI tools could transform almost every human endeavor.
